nodes.bodyText: Just for the record regarding these script changes; we are going to need to adapt the specific scripts used for the product conversion as well
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -82,3 +82,6 @@ rem # Uncomment and edit to use a custom java.security file to override all the
 rem set "JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS% -Djava.security.properties==C:\path\to\custom\java.security"
 
 :JAVA_OPTS_SET
+
+rem # Uncomment to add a Java agent
+rem set "MODULE_OPTS=-javaagent:agent.jar"

nodes.bodyText: I guess I didn't realize we had custom scripts to those. Can you point me to them so I can have a look?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -82,3 +82,6 @@ rem # Uncomment and edit to use a custom java.security file to override all the

+
+rem # Uncomment to add a Java agent
+rem set "MODULE_OPTS=-javaagent:agent.jar"

nodes.bodyText:
Hello James, sure:
https://github.com/jbossas/wildfly-to-product/commits/wf-to-cd
Take a look at "Community to EAP conversion -- Bring in EAP-specific scripts "
